General.Name: IFE Elevators Co Ltd
General.Description: IFE Elevators Co., Ltd. researches, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells elevators, escalators, moving walks, and related products in China and internationally. Its products include residential, high-speed, hospital, panoramic, home, and freight elevators, as well as escalators and moving sidewalks. The company was formerly known as Dongguan IFE Elevators Co., Ltd. and changed its name to IFE Elevators Co.,LTD. in 2011. IFE Elevators Co.,LTD. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Dongguan, China.
